text: Sunflower is a town in Sunflower County, Mississippi. As of the census of 2020, there were 964 people, 354 households, and 248 families residing in the town. As of 2022, the median income for a household in the town was near $23,295, and the median income for a family was near $44,750. Musicians Matt Murphy and Jerry Butler were born here. ==References== Category:Towns in Mississippi
title: Sunflower, Mississippi
